nodes.text: "Fuel for the Fire" (German title "Gefährlicher Treibstoff") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 4th issue of the German Star Wars Resistance Animation-Magazine, released on November 20, 2019.
The comic partially adapts the episode of the same name of the television series Star Wars Resistance.
